attributes.action: Have a major overhaul of how car insurance companies operate, especially in the case of young drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The way car insurance is run is completely outrageous. The government stepped in when oil companies were making unfair profits, insurance companies are doing the same. Not only is this affecting young drivings, its increasing the number of un insured drivers on the roads, as well as taking allot of money away from the economy in ways that 1000 charachters wont let me describe. We need a complete re-evaluation of the system

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
